scripts.test:loc: cross-env ENV=prd npx playwright test tests/example.spec.ts --project firefox --reporter=list --headed
scripts.test:dev: cross-env ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/example.spec.ts
scripts.test:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/example.spec.ts
scripts.test:prd: cross-env ENV=prd npx playwright test tests/example.spec.ts
